topbar.html: NEW!! Get All the scripts in one with our Premium Pack.

hero_home.title: Gas Station
hero_home.subtitle: Realistic fueling for gas & electric vehicles—upgrade your server’s immersion!

faq.question: Are your files protected ?
faq.answer: Yes, all our files are encrypted by cfx to preserve the intellectual property.

faq.question: I have an issue, can I get assistance?
faq.answer: Join our Discord server for comprehensive support. Response times may vary due to time zone differences, so we appreciate your patience!

faq.question: Can I unsubscribe ?
faq.answer: Yes, you can unsubscribe at any time. Your package will be instantly removed from Keymaster, and your access will be revoked until you subscribe again.

faq.question: Are your scripts updated often ?
faq.answer: Our scripts are updated when needed. If a bug occurs we'll take care of it. You'll be notified when an fix has been done.

faq.question: Can I get a custom script ?
faq.answer: Of course! Just reach out to us via the form below or open a ticket on our Discord server. However, please note that prices may be higher later.

6728991.title: Premium Pack
6728991.subtitle: Unlock unlimited premium resources for one low monthly fee.
6728991.description: Upgrade your FiveM server with our all-in-one subscription bundle – designed for ESX, QBCore, and adaptable to custom frameworks. This comprehensive package elevates your roleplay experience by combining efficient job management with an immersive fueling system. Enjoy realistic container handling with dynamic, randomized rewards from our Job Handler Script, alongside advanced fueling mechanics that support both gasoline and electric vehicles with on-the-go jerrycan functionality. With regular updates, priority support, and a cost-effective price, this bundle is your ultimate solution for a serious server upgrade.

6574000.title: Handler Job
6574000.subtitle: Run the docks, load containers, and earn big—bring your port to life!
6574000.description: Transform your server's port into a bustling logistics hub with the Handler Job. This immersive script lets players step into the role of a Port Handler, managing container loading and trailer operations while earning dynamic rewards. Fully integrated with ESX and featuring an intuitive RageUI menu, it offers realistic gameplay, customizable settings, and a seamless setup that transforms your port into the heart of activity.
keyFeatures: Immersive logistics to transform your port.
Integrated RageUI menu for seamless job management.
Precise vehicle operations for accurate container handling.
Randomized payment system for dynamic rewards.
AI truck departures for realistic port activity.
Customizable settings to fine-tune payouts and mechanics.

6728069.title: Gas Station
6728069.subtitle: Realistic fueling for gas & electric vehicles—upgrade your server’s immersion!
6728069.description: Enhance your server’s roleplay with our Advanced Fuel Station Script. Fully compatible with ESX, QBCore, and custom frameworks, this state-of-the-art solution delivers realistic fueling mechanics for both gasoline and electric vehicles. Enjoy seamless integration, multi-fuel support, and a handy jerrycan feature for on-the-go refueling—all securely encrypted and easily customizable to fit your unique gameplay style.
keyFeatures: Immersive fueling with realistic mechanics for gas and electric vehicles.
Multi-Fuel Support for refueling and charging at dedicated pumps.
Jerrycan feature for on-the-go emergency refills.
Seamless integration with ESX, QBCore, and custom frameworks.
Enhanced security with full encryption for safe customization.
